import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import "../../css/EditCompany.css"; import register from "../../images/register.png"; import { Col, Container, Form, Label, Row } from "reactstrap"; import Radio from "@material-ui/core/Radio"; import TextField from "@material-ui/core/TextField"; import SidebarAdmin from "../Sidebar/SidebarAdmin"; import { useLocation } from "react-router-dom"; import { FormControl, FormControlLabel, RadioGroup } from "@material-ui/core"; function CompanyRegister() { const [status, setStatus] = useState(0); const location = useLocation(); console.log(location.state); const handleChange = (event) => { setStatus(event.target.value); }; function handleSubmit(event) { event.preventDefault(); } return (
} label="Active" checked={status === 1 ? true : false} onChange={handleChange} /> } label="Deactive" checked={status === 0 ? true : false} onChange={handleChange} />
); } export default CompanyRegister;
